definition: once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同变速自行车，很多档，很多人都不曾用过。

sentences.english: No transition is ever smooth or easy.
sentences.chinese: 不曾有过平顺或轻松的过渡。

sentences.english: They may teach you somthing you have never done.
sentences.chinese: 也许，他们还教会你不曾会做的事情。

sentences.english: We have not bound your feet with our entreating arms.
sentences.chinese: 我们不曾用恳求的手臂来抱住你的双足。

sentences.english: I commiserated the people who misdoubt the love because of they were never experienced.
sentences.chinese: 我同情不相信爱情的人，因为他们不曾经历过。

sentences.english: I too loved my closest disciple although we were not beloveds .
sentences.chinese: 我也爱著我最亲近的门徒，尽管我们不曾是爱人。

sentences.english: Never get lost again after, how can I know that it is a kind of heart.
sentences.chinese: 不曾得到后又失去，又怎知那是一种怎样的撕心裂肺。

sentences.english: Gushan to have turned evil, never to month Begonia trouble.
sentences.chinese: 到得孤山翻作恶，海棠闹月不曾来。

sentences.english: Empress Dowager of the palace and gardens from the withers not a dewy rose.
sentences.chinese: 皇太后的花园及行宫是从不曾凋谢的一支带露玫瑰。

sentences.english: If you never had a trial, How could you call yourself an overcomer?
sentences.chinese: 如果你不曾经过试探，你怎能说你是得胜者？

sentences.english: Knowing me never made anyone a needle.
sentences.chinese: 我是线，却不曾有针从我这里过。

sentences.english: Who hasn’t dreamt of visiting Paris once in this lifetime?
sentences.chinese: 谁不曾梦想在这辈子能去一次巴黎？

sentences.english: all of people in the office concerned about she ,because no one has seen her lately.
sentences.chinese: 近来谁也不曾见过她，这使办公室所有同仁深感不安。

sentences.english: Yet it has generated entirely unanticipated social and business behavior.
sentences.chinese: 但是它产生了完全不曾预料到的社会和业务行为。

sentences.english: The 'broken windows' theory of crime prevention has never been so drastically condensed.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪预防的“破窗”理论从来都不曾如此彻底的简练。

sentences.english: But there are tens of thousands other baby seals who are not as lucky as Shammy.
sentences.chinese: 而十多万只幼年海豹却不曾如此幸运。

definition: did I ever ...? (or "did he ever ...?" etc)
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
many times/on more than one occasion
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
